## What we do

# Our Home Staging Magic

## Join forces with Design Gaga for a fun, stress-free staging experience. We mix creativity with the latest trends to make your home shine and attract buyers. Let’s make your place look irresistible!

**Design for Home**

Elevate your space with Design Gaga. Discover expert interior design services to bring your dream home to life.

**Proven Track Record**

Led by Gagan Arora, our experienced team brings a fresh touch to home staging. We tailor our approach to make your home shine and bring your vision to life.

**Detail-Oriented Planning**

With Design gaga, every step of staging—from design to installation—is handled with care. You choose how involved you want to be, while we make sure everything looks perfect.

**Intentional Design**

For home staging, Design brings a blend of modern flair and timeless elegance. We craft each space to highlight its best features, tailored just for you and your lifestyle.

## Discover our full-service interior design, where modern aesthetics meet curated, bold choices to reflect your unique vision. We specialize in creating sophisticated, relaxed living spaces through thoughtful staging—perfect for elevating homes in Toronto's competitive market.

## How it Works

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Your-paragraph-text-26-1024x156.png)

## Benefits of Full Service Design

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Personalized-Approach-2.svg)

### Personalized Staging Plan

Custom staging strategies designed to showcase your property’s unique strengths and appeal to potential buyers.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Seamless-Experience.svg)

### Hassle-Free Experience

We handle everything—from furniture selection to final setup—for a seamless, stress-free staging process.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Expert-Guidance.svg)

### Expert Staging Guidance

Benefit from our extensive experience in real estate and design, ensuring your property is staged to sell fast.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/pixelcut-export-67-683x1024.png)

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/pixelcut-export-68-1-683x1024.png)

## Deliverables

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Archiectural-Review-1.svg)

### Property Assessment

We start with an in-depth review of your property to understand the space, its layout, and potential for maximizing appeal to buyers.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Furniture-Selection-1.svg)

### Furniture Selection & Styling

Our team carefully selects furnishings and decor, from sofas to artwork, that complement your property’s style and create an inviting atmosphere.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Interior-Design-1.svg)

### Accessory & Decor Sourcing

We procure the perfect accessories, ensuring every detail—down to the smallest vase or throw pillow—is meticulously chosen to highlight the home’s best features.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Project-Management-1.svg)

### Project Management

We manage every aspect of the staging process from start to finish, coordinating logistics, deliveries, and installations to ensure everything runs smoothly.

![](https://designgaga.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Turnkey-Installaiton-1.svg)

### Turnkey Installation

Our team handles the full setup, arranging furniture and decor to bring your vision to life. When we’re done, your home will be ready for professional photos and viewings.

## Elevating Spaces: The Natural Elegance of Gagan’s Staging Style

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is the difference between home staging and interior design?

Home staging focuses on making a property attractive to potential buyers by arranging furniture and decor to showcase the space. Interior design, on the other hand, is tailored to the homeowner’s personal taste and lifestyle.

How do I know if home staging is right for my listing?

If you’re looking to sell your property quickly and at the best price, home staging is a proven strategy to increase buyer interest and help them visualize living in the space.

How much does home staging cost?

Our home staging services are customized based on the size of your property, the level of staging required, and the duration. Contact us for a personalized quote!

Can I see examples of homes you’ve staged?

Absolutely! We’d be happy to share our portfolio of past projects so you can see the transformations for yourself.

How long does the staging process take?

Typically, home staging can be completed within a few days, depending on the complexity of the project and the size of the home.

## Careers

## DesignGaga was founded with the mission of transforming spaces into inspiring, beautiful environments. Since our beginning, we’ve been committed to making interiors that resonate with both functionality and creativity. At DesignGaga, our core values—creativity, collaboration, integrity, and continuous innovation—shape everything we do. They drive our design philosophy, foster a positive and inclusive culture, and enhance the experience for both our clients and team members. We’re excited to work together and make every space a true reflection of beauty and purpose with you!

## Current Openings

## Customer Experience Associate

## DesignGaga Office HQ, Toronto, ON, Canada

## Posted 2 weeks ago, Full-Time

## Join our team as a Customer Experience Associate and play a key role in ensuring our clients receive the best service possible. You’ll handle client communications, manage inquiries, and support our project teams in delivering top-notch staging and design services.

## Interior Designer

## DesignGaga Office HQ, Toronto, ON, Canada

## Posted 2 weeks ago, Full-Time

## We are looking for a Creative Interior Designer to join our growing team. You’ll collaborate with clients to create beautiful, functional spaces that elevate homes in the Toronto market. Experience with residential interiors and a strong design portfolio are essential.

## Project Coordinator

## DesignGaga Office HQ, Toronto, ON, Canada

## Posted 2 weeks ago, Full-Time

## As a Project Coordinator, you will manage the logistics of staging projects from start to finish. This includes overseeing timelines, coordinating deliveries, and ensuring that every detail of the staging process runs smoothly.

## Marketing Coordinator

## DesignGaga Office HQ, Toronto, ON, Canada

## Posted 2 weeks ago, Full-Time

## Join our team as a Marketing Coordinator to help develop and execute marketing strategies that showcase our staging and design services. You’ll work on social media campaigns, digital advertising, and content creation to grow our presence in the Toronto real estate market.
